text: Session anchor: implemented [[slug]] double-bracket cross-ref syntax, doc node SQLite fallback, auto-stub creation for missing refs, kg migrate-refs command, kg reindex/upgrade doc indexing fix, kg status version display

Promoted to [[kg-architecture]]: [[slug]] syntax change, doc node SQLite fallback (_node_from_db), auto-stub creation, kg migrate-refs, reindex/upgrade doc fix, kg status version, upgrade reindex timing gotcha.
Updated [[graph-hygiene]], [[how-to-use-kg]], [[graph-first-workflow]], [[bullet-quality]] bullets from [slug] to [[slug]] cross-ref syntax.
intent: fix kg cross-referencing (switch to [[slug]], auto-stubs, backlinks) + fix doc node indexing/search quality

outcome: [[slug]] syntax throughout, auto-stub on kg add, kg migrate-refs, _node_from_db fallback, separate fts/fts_doc calibration, upgrade uses new binary, search page doc toggle — released v0.3.24–0.3.27
